name: Pot Luck 1 Quiz / Test | Mixed 10 Questions | 10 Questions

questions.text: If you were doing crewel work what kind of tools would you use?
questions.explanation:
Embroidery Needles.

	It is colorful embroidery work.

questions.text: In nautical terms how long is a dog watch?
Synovial fluid is in the body for what reason?
questions.explanation:
Lubricates joints.

	It actually plays two parts. It is for nutrition and lubrication.

Bomb.

	Usually a crude homemade bomb of flammable liquid in a bottle with a rag stuffed into the aperture. The rag is lit and the bottle thrown, so that when the bottle smashes, the liquid disperses.

questions.text: What is used to make ceviche?
questions.explanation:
Fish.

	The fish is joined with vinegar.

questions.text: Which branch of the U.S. military is the youngest?
questions.explanation:
Air Force.

	It was part of the army until 1947.

questions.text: Which of the following states is not touched by the Ohio River?
In boxing who was known as the 'Pittsburg Kid'?
questions.explanation:
Billy Conn.

	He was a heavyweight who came very close to beating Joe Louis in 1941.

questions.text: How many ships were raided at the Boston Tea Party?
questions.explanation:
3.

	Took place December 16,1773. 342 chests of tea were thrown into Boston harbor.

questions.text: What does a serologist specialize in?
questions.explanation:
Body fluids.

	It's the science of serums and their actions.
